title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet
descriptions:
Product Listing:

Introducing the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet. This high-quality welding helmet is perfect for a variety of welding processes including TIG, MIG, and MMA. 

With a viewing size of 3.64 inches in width and 1.67 inches in height, you'll have a clear and wide field of vision. The helmet features 2 sensors and a switch speed of 1/30000 seconds, ensuring fast and accurate auto-darkening.

The optical clarity of this helmet is top-notch, rated at 1/1/1/1. It also offers compatibility with Cheater Lens and Magnifying Lens, allowing you to customize your viewing experience.

Say goodbye to frequent battery changes, as this welding helmet has an increased battery life. The superior comfort of the helmet is further enhanced by the pivot style headgear, providing a secure and comfortable fit.

The shade range of this helmet is impressive, with a minimum shade of 4 and a maximum shade of 13, making it suitable for various welding applications.

Invest in the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet and experience enhanced visibility, comfort, and protection during your welding projects.

Introducing the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, a must-have for professional welders. This high-quality welding helmet is designed to enhance your welding experience and ensure your safety.

Suitable for TIG, MIG, and MMA processes, this helmet provides optimal protection and comfort. The viewing size of 3.64 inches in width and 1.67 inches in height allows for clear visibility of your work area. With 2 sensors and a switch speed of 1/30000 seconds, this helmet automatically adjusts to the perfect shade to protect your eyes from harmful sparks and radiation.

Featuring an optical clarity rating of 1/1/1/1, this helmet provides exceptional visibility and clarity. The lens compatibility allows for the use of Cheater Lens or Magnifying Lens, ensuring precise and accurate welding.

The YESWELDER Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet offers an increased battery life, eliminating the need for frequent battery changes. The superior comfort provided by the pivot style headgear ensures a secure fit and minimizes fatigue during long welding sessions.

With a shade range of 4 to 13, this helmet offers adjustable protection to suit different welding applications. Whether you are working on TIG, MIG, or MMA projects, this helmet is the perfect choice.

Invest in the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet and experience the ultimate combination of safety, comfort, and performance.
